attributes.action: reduce the tax burden penalty on middle income married couples with children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The traditional family unit (married with kids) faces a tax burden and reduced access to welfare benefits and tax breaks because they have chosen to marry.  Now it is financially beneficial for couples to split up (or remain unmarried) than be married and hold down a steady job owing to the number of benefit handouts available.
